name: Thunder Strike
description:
Survive on the alien ship for as long as you can! Enemies are gonna come in waves, so you better get ready with a handy upgrading chest in the middle of the level.

Submission to a 6-day "$100 JTAGame Jam #4".

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look/Shoot
  • E - Interact
  • Esc - Menu
